snippet: Mexico-based home builder Desarrolladora Homex SAB de CV has agreed to settle charges it reported fake sales to boost revenues in what U.S. authorities said on Friday was a $3.3 billion accounting fraud....

headline.main: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
headline.print_headline: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House

lead_paragraph: Mexico-based home builder Desarrolladora Homex SAB de CV has agreed to settle charges it reported fake sales to boost revenues in what U.S. authorities said on Friday was a $3.3 billion accounting fraud.
